text: The Mosquito Coast is a 1986 American adventure drama movie directed by Peter Weir and was based on the 1981 novel of the same name by Paul Theroux. It stars Harrison Ford, River Phoenix, Helen Mirren, Conrad Roberts, Jason Alexander, Andre Gregory, Martha Plimpton, Butterfly McQueen and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:1986 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Peter Weir Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Jungle movies Category:Movies set in Central America Category:Movies set in Baltimore
title: The Mosquito Coast
